CustomField.description: Label displayed at the end (right side) of a horizontal scale question. For example: "Very Easy", "Strongly Agree", or "Very Satisfied". This helps users understand what the highest value on the scale represents.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the label for the end of the scale (e.g., "Very Easy"). This will be displayed on the right side of horizontal scale questions to guide respondents.
CustomField.label: Scale End Label
